problem_text_cn: 如图,在四边形ABCD中,AD∥BC,BF平分∠ABC,交AD于点F,CE平分∠BCD,交AD于点E,AB=8,CD=6,EF=2,则AD长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the quadrilateral ABCD, AD ∥ BC, BF bisects ∠ABC and it intersects AD at point F, CE bisects ∠BCD, and it intersects AD at point E, AB = N_0, CD = N_1, EF = N_2, then the length of AD is ()
raw_comment: 本题主要考查等腰三角形的判定与性质,解题的关键是掌握平行线的性质与等腰三角形的判定与性质
